Articles.Content:
Ok you have seen the janitor and all that but this takes it to a whole new level. You have to DOCK using as many mods as you want as long as it technically works (the ship can move a little but it cant blow up) [AGAIN use as many mods as you can]

This will require some practice here are my tips.

1. Build a decently sized space station (big enough for your ship to dock in and add the docking mechanism to this.)

2. Launch it into orbit

3. DO NOT END THE FLIGHT!!! You have to press Esc., Space Center

4.Now build your ship that will dock.

5. Launch it, make sure to use rcs, and also you gotta time it right that you get to the station

6. use the RCS to fine tune your docking,

7. Use lander legs to keep your self connected to the dock (you have to put yourself in the docking slot on your space station)

8. Press Esc. Go to space station and switch back to the station.

9. Use the landing legs again on the station to close in the ship

10. PROFIT
The challenge was ended as soon as it started. 8)
Hold on, I need to put my prize money at Gringots.
I feel mildly dirty looking at that image.
